member.name: EMRGLSRECORD

summary.para: The EMRGLSRECORD structure contains members for an enhanced metafile record generated by OpenGL functions. It contains data for OpenGL functions that scale automatically to the OpenGL viewport.

member.seealso: OpenGL on Windows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows 95/98

summary.para: The base structure for all records.
Array of data representing the OpenGL function to be performed.
